CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"1 Prospect"),Amount*0.08, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"2 Qualified"),Amount*0.18, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"3 Opportunity Shaped"),Amount*0.28, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"4 Proposal"),Amount*0.35, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"5 Agreements Delivered"),Amount*0.64, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"6 Negotiating"),Amount*0.88, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"7 Verbal Agreement"),Amount*0.96, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"8 Closed Won"),Amount, 0))))))))
CustomField.label: Bookings Projection
